about_the_game:
Overview

The oppressive regime has been overthrown. You are a low-level news censor recently employed by the new Ogalian regime. You will interpret censorship protocols, read news articles, and take down ones that violate the protocols. You will wrestle with the ultimate choice: Should you censor dissenting voices for the government or let the people be heard?

Key features

  • You read and take down articles that violate rules.

  • Apologize to the government if you make a mistake.

  • Government employees, including YOU, must drink tea, or you get fired.

  • And long live Ogalia. Never forget to say it. Long live Ogalia.

short_description: Silencer is a bureaucratic simulation game about censorship and misinformation in journalism and politics. As a low-level news censor employed by the authoritarian government, Ogalia, the player will interpret censorship protocols, read news articles, and decide if an article should be taken down.
